  • Method Details

    • createAttribute

      public static final Attribute createAttribute(DataInputStream inStream, ConstPoolRetriever consts) throws IOException
      Creates an attribute from the input stream.
      Parameters:
      inStream - the input stream to read the .class file
      consts - the constant pool retriever
      Returns:
      the newly created attribute, or null if operation failed
      Throws:
      IOException - if the input stream fails to read the entire attribute

    • recoverAttribute

      protected static Attribute recoverAttribute(Attribute attr) throws IOException
      Recovers details from the attribute.
      Parameters:
      attr - the general attribute
      Returns:
      the new attribute built with this class, or null if attribute details don't match
      Throws:
      IOException - if the input stream fails to read the entire attribute

      protected final DataInputStream createInfoInStream()
      Creates a new info data input stream for subclasses to re-parse attributes.
      Returns:
      a new DataInputStream for subclasses to read info[]
